alert.note: Alert for Central Yampa River Basin; Debeque to Silt Corridor; Flat Tops; Grand Valley; Lower Yampa River Basin; Roan and Tavaputs Plateaus (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 24 at 4:19PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...SNOW SQUALL... HAZARDS...A snow squall accompanied by winds of up to 30 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than a quarter of a mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 418 PM MDT, a snow squall was along a line extending from 21 miles east of Rangely to 30 miles northwest of Parachute to 27 miles north of Fruita and moving east at 55 MPH. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Meeker. This includes the following highways... Colorado 13 between mile markers 27 and 44. Colorado 64 between mile markers 42 and 73. Colorado 139 between mile markers 23 and 40. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this squall. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
